error.title: Subset context
error.description:
## Invalid subset context
Context of the given subset doesn't match your current scene.
### How to repair?
You can fix this with "repair" button on the right and refresh Publish at the bottom right.
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__ (optional)
This might happen if you are reuse old workfile and open it in different context. (Eg. you created subset "renderCompositingDefault" from asset "Robot' in "your_project_Robot_compositing.aep", now you opened this workfile in a context "Sloth" but existing subset for "Robot" asset stayed in the workfile.)
